item.title: Hurricane Erin becomes a Category 4 in the Caribbean as the region braces for flooding

item.title: Old Fiddler's Convention is pushing 90 and keeping mountain music alive
item.description: The Old Fiddler's Convention in Galax, Va., features mostly amateur musicians playing Bluegrass and Old Time music. At age 89, it's the oldest continuous competition of its kind in the U.S.

item.title: Chimpanzees pick up communication styles from their moms, not their dads
item.description: A new study finds that chimpanzee babies learn vocal and visual communication patterns from their mothers. The findings may shed light on the way human babies learn from those close to them.
